title: Can't buy any champion

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I'm just trying to buy Jayce look at screenshot. I have 5000 IP wont let me buy any champion other then 3150 champs strangely.

replies.body: It sounds like your IP balance was out of sync.  Relog when you get a chance, and try again!  Let me know.
I've relogged it's been like this all week though so I'm guessing it client wise. I can't downgrade either to the old client for whatever reason since I keep getting a error.
